idea-plugin.name: Fathom
idea-plugin.description:
Fathom helps AI coding assistants (Claude, Gemini, Codex, and others) better understand your Unreal Engine 5 C++ projects. It provides MCP tools that give LLMs access to solution-wide code analysis, Blueprint discovery, and asset summaries, reducing hallucinations and improving productivity.

Features

  • Solution-Wide Code Analysis: Let your LLM query inspections and diagnostics for any file in the solution, not just open ones.
  • Blueprint and Asset Discovery: Find derived Blueprints and view asset summaries alongside your C++ code.
  • MCP Integration: Exposes project context as MCP tools that any compatible AI assistant can use.
  • Markdown and JSON Output: Results formatted for easy consumption by both humans and LLMs.

Requirements

  • Windows only
  • Rider 2025.3+
  • Unreal Engine 5.4+
